participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: determined and independent, eager to break free from parental oversight.
participant_1.background: they are constantly on my back. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i work; i have a part-time job at Burger King.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: passionate and nurturing, enjoys sharing knowledge and helping others.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.
